HomePage.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (Next.js & Spring Boot)
HomePage.description: I'm Rubens Q. Alves, a Full-Stack Software Engineer working with Next.js and Spring Boot, with a strong focus on backend architecture, APIs, and scalable web applications.

AboutPage.title: I'm Rubens Q. Alves, developer in Brazil.
AboutPage.description1: I’m a self-motivated software developer focused on full-stack web development and open-source. I enjoy building interactive, well-structured web applications, with a strong emphasis on the client side. My main tools include JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js, and Spingboot.
AboutPage.description2: I believe continuous learning comes from experience, so I try to take something valuable from every situation — even the challenging ones.
AboutPage.list1: I enjoy refining designs and UIs with care and precision, focusing on delivering polished results rather than simply shipping more features.
AboutPage.list2: I use Next.js to build fast, scalable web applications, taking advantage of features like server-side rendering, static generation, and the App Router to improve performance, SEO, and overall user experience.
AboutPage.list3: I use Spring Boot to develop robust and scalable backend applications, building well-structured, secure, and maintainable APIs with a focus on performance, code organization, and best practices.
